properties.name: server.sms.twilio.account.sid
properties.description: SID for Twilio.

properties.name: server.sms.twilio.auth.token
properties.description: Authentication token for Twilio.

properties.name: server.sms.twilio.phone.number
properties.description: Phone number to be used in Twilio for sending SMS.

properties.name: server.sms.twilio.verified.phone.number
properties.description: Twilio verified phone number. For debugging purpose.

properties.name: jwt.secret.key
properties.description: Secret key for JWT token.

properties.name: jwt.alive.seconds
properties.description: JWT token valid seconds.

properties.name: email.sender.host
properties.description: Host provider for the Email.

properties.name: email.host.port
properties.description: Port number for Email host provider.

properties.name: email.username
properties.description: Username of the email host provider is your provided email address.

properties.name: email.password
properties.description: Password of the Email. But Google has enforced app specific password in recent times, so please generate app specific password in the Google Account.

properties.name: email.transport.protocol
properties.description: Network Protocol for the Email host provider.

properties.name: email.smtp.auth
properties.description: Enable authentication for the Email SMTP.

properties.name: email.smtp.starttls.enable
properties.description: Enable STMP Start TLS for the Email host provider.

properties.name: email.debug
properties.description: Enable debug for the Email service.

properties.name: server.otp.alive.minutes
properties.description: OTP alive minutes(The current generated ones).

properties.name: server.otp.maximumAliveMinutes
properties.description: Maximum alive minutes that all OTPs in the server. (OTPs are stored temporarily using Google LoadingCache). It will never be stored in the DB of the application (Best practice).

properties.name: rabbitmq.connection.factory.username
properties.description: Username for accessing RabbitMQ client in your machine.

properties.name: rabbitmq.connection.factory.password
properties.description: Password for accessing RabbitMQ client in your machine.

properties.name: server.otp.maximumRetryAttempt
properties.description: All OTPs maximum retry attempt. If maximum attempt reached, the OTP will be disabled and the frontend have to request a new OTP again.

properties.name: server.otp.length
properties.description: Length of the One Time Password for verification.

properties.name: password.lower.case.character.length
properties.description: Minimum number of lower case characters in the password.

properties.name: password.upper.case.character.length
properties.description: Minimum number of upper case characters in the password.

properties.name: password.digit.number.character.length
properties.description: Minimum number of digit number in the password.

properties.name: password.special.character.length
properties.description: Minimum number of special characters in the password.

properties.name: password.minimum.length
properties.description: Minimum number of characters in the password.

properties.name: encryption.aes.cipher.algorithm.with.padding
properties.description: Algorithm for the cipher to be used for creating AES. Recommended by SonarLint.

properties.name: encryption.rsa.cipher.algorithm.with.padding
properties.description: Cipher algorithm for RSA encryption. Recommended by SonarLint.

properties.name: encryption.rsa.cipher.key.size
properties.description: Size of the key made for every RSA key pair. The longer it is, the more seucre it gets, but longer it gets computed.

properties.name: server.startup.send.email.enabled
properties.description: Enable this to send an email when the application is started.

properties.name: server.startup.send.sms.enabled
properties.description: Enable this to send an SMS when the application is started.

properties.name: encryption.rsa.public.key.directory
properties.description: Directory for RSA Public key. Used for general RSA Encryption.

properties.name: encryption.rsa.private.key.directory
properties.description: Directory for RSA Private key. Used for general RSA Encryption.

properties.name: encryption.aes.private.key.directory
properties.description: Directory for AES Private key. Used for general AES Encryption.

properties.name: encryption.rsa.cipher.algorithm.provider
properties.description: Provider of the RSA cipher algorithm. There are some required open source providers for some algorithms.

properties.name: encryption.aes.default.secret
properties.description: Default key for AES encryption's secret.

properties.name: encryption.aes.default.secret.key.spec.algorithm
properties.description: Algorithm of the Cipher used by the Default AES loaded with encryption.aes.default.secret.

properties.name: encryption.aes.cipher.algorithm.with.padding2
properties.description: Algorithm for the cipher to be used for creating AES. Recommended by SonarLint. Used by multiple tutorials.

properties.name: encryption.rsa.cipher.algorithm.with.padding2
properties.description: 2nd Cipher algorithm for RSA encryption. Recommended by SonarLint. Used by 3rd party.

properties.name: encryption.aes.message.digest.algorithm
properties.description: Message digest algorithm for the AES Encryption.

properties.name: password.special.character.list
properties.description: Specify which special characters are used in password policy. Used for generation or validate password requirments.

properties.name: password.maximum.length
properties.description: Maximum number of characters in the password.

properties.name: email.send.sms.to.email
properties.description: Allow send SMS content to email. For debug purpose only.

properties.name: email.send.sms.to.email.address
properties.description: Email address to be used for see SMS content. For debug purpose only.

properties.name: encryption.rsa.key.factory.algorithm
properties.description: RSA algorithm for Key Factory for default encryption of this project.

properties.name: encryption.rsa.cipher.algorithm.with.padding2.for.encryption
properties.description: Custom RSA Cipher object's algorithm to test more secure RSA encryption. Used for encryption.

properties.name: encryption.rsa.cipher.algorithm.with.padding2.for.decryption
properties.description: Custom RSA Cipher object's algorithm to test more secure RSA encryption. Used for decryption.

properties.name: server.sms.allow.send.sms
properties.description: If true, the system will really send the SMS. If false, the system will not send the SMS.

properties.name: server.file.windows.base.directory
properties.description: Directory for all files uploaded to the Windows machine.

properties.name: server.file.linux.base.directory
properties.description: Directory for all files uploaded to the Linux server.

properties.name: server.file.macos.base.directory
properties.description: Directory for all files uploaded to the MacOS machine.
